description:
After their battle with N`doul, Kakyoin and Avdol are badly hurt, so they take them to a hospital in Aswan. While being careful of possible enemies around them, Polnareff picks a cafe for the rest of the crew to go into. However, that cafe had already been taken over by the Stand user brothers, Khnum`s Zenyatta and Thoth`s Mondatta. Zenyatta disguises himself as the manager of the cafe and tries to serve Jojo and the others poisoned black tea, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 「クヌム神」のオインゴと「トト神」のボインゴ
